title: Beira Mar.2015.HDRip.720p.Nacional.AVI-Makalakato
description:
Beira-Mar (Seashore) / 2015 / Brazil / 720p / AVI / 

Portuguese speaking, with hard-coded spanish subtitles. The film is still on festival circuit (Berlim, Guadalajara, Malaga, Torino, Taipei, Lima, San Diego, Rio de Janeiro). It has just won Felix Prize (for best gay-themed movie) in Rio Film Festival 2015. If somebody has the English subtitles, please share with us. 

My upload speed is a shame, so please help me seeding.
